00001 <?php
00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../include/tag_support.inc.php");
00003 
00004         define("LOCALIZATION_DEBUG", 0);
00005 
00010         class Localization
00011         {
00016                 public static $languages = array('it', 'en', 'es');
00017 
00022                 private static $strings_table;
00023         
00029                 public static function localize($term)
00030                 {
00031                         if (!self::$strings_table)
00032                         {
00033                                 self::load_strings_table();
00034                         }
00035                         return self::wrap((array_key_exists($term, self::$strings_table)) ?
00036                                 self::$strings_table[$term] : $term);
00037                 }
00038         
00044                 private static function wrap($term)
00045                 {
00046                         if (!LOCALIZATION_DEBUG) return $term;
00047                         return span($term, array('class' => 'localization-debug'));
00048                 }
00049         
00056                 private static function load_strings_file($lang = 'en', $controller = NULL)
00057                 {
00058                         $strings_file = $controller ?
00059                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/$controller/localizable-$lang.php" :
00060                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/localizable-$lang.php";
00061                         
00062                         //print_r($strings_file);
00063                 
00064                         if (file_exists($strings_file))
00065                         {
00066                                 return file_get_contents($strings_file);
00067                         }
00068                         else if ($lang != 'en')
00069                         {
00070                                 return self::load_strings_file('en', $controller);
00071                         }
00072                         return "array()";
00073                 }
00074 
00080                 private static function load_strings_table()
00081                 {
00082                         $table = array();
00083                 
00084                         $controller = $_REQUEST['controller'];
00085                 
00086                         $global_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'] /* GLOBAL */);
00087                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$global_strings};"));
00088                         $local_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'], $controller);
00089                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$local_strings};"));
00090                 
00091                         self::$strings_table = $table;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095 ?>
